    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Satellite orbiting the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satelliten, die Masse in Umlauf bringend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Satellite satellisant la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satellite orbitando a terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satellite orbitando intorno alla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφόρος που βάζει τη γη σε τροχιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Basado en los satélites moviendo en órbita 
alrededor de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows path taken by and the force acting on a satellite orbiting the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Satellites</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Pfad, der vorbei 
genommen werden und die Kraft, die auf einem Satelliten fungiert, die 
Masse in Umlauf bringend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la voie d'accès prise 
près et la force agissant sur un satellite satellisant la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o trajeto feito exame 
perto e a força que age em um satellite orbitando a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il percorso preso 
vicino e la forza che si comporta su un satellite orbitando intorno 
alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το μονοπάτι που 
λαμβάνονται κοντά και τη δύναμη ενεργώντας σε έναν δορυφόρο που 
βάζει τη γη σε τροχιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el camino tomado cerca 
y la fuerza que actúa en un basado en los satélites moviendo en 
órbita alrededor de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
